cleaned_text: Announcements Survey Result Summary: BC Regulated Health Professionals' Views on Indigenous Cultural Safety, Humility and Anti-Racism Practice Standard Jun 21 2023 Pivotal Research Survey on BC Regulated Health Professionals' Views on Indigenous Cultural Safety, Humility and Anti-Racism Practice Standard Implementation - [...] Provincial Health Officer updates order to require BC health regulatory colleges to record the COVID-19 vaccination status of registrants on an ongoing basis June 16, 2022 The Provincial Health Officer (PHO) has updated an information-sharing order first issued on March 7, 2022 that
